body.p:
Carlisle Ky Dec 12th 1865
Gov Thos E Bramblett

Some time ago I sent you a petition for the remittance of a fine against J. W. Scott for a breach of the peace the finding was before the Judge of the Quarterly court, the fine $25,00 I now send the fee of $2,00 which I have neglected untill now. I dislike to trouble you, but having Mislaid the letter informing me to send the $2, forgot the name & hence trouble you

y Very respectfully
A W Blair S, n ,C
